trans-unit.source: This website uses cookies. Those have two functions: On the one hand they are providing basic functionality for this website. On the other hand they allow us to improve our content for you by saving and analyzing anonymized user data. You can redraw your consent to to using these cookies at any time. Find more information regarding cookies on our %1$s and regarding us on the %2$s.
trans-unit.target: Ce site web utilise des cookies. Ceux-ci ont deux fonctions : d'une part, ils fournissent des fonctionnalités de base pour le site web. D'un autre côté, ils nous permettent d'améliorer notre contenu en enregistrant et en analysant les données anonymes des utilisateurs. Vous pouvez à tout moment réconsiderer votre consentement à l'utilisation de ces cookies. Trouvez plus d'informations sur les cookies sur notre %1$s et sur notre %2$s.

alt-trans.target: Ce site Web utilise des cookies. Ceux-ci ont deux fonctions : d'une part, ils fournissent des fonctionnalités de base pour le site web. D'un autre côté, ils nous permettent d'améliorer notre contenu en enregistrant et en analysant les données anonymes des utilisateurs. Vous pouvez réitérer votre consentement à tout moment à l'utilisation de ces cookies. Trouvez plus d'informations sur les cookies sur notre %1$s et sur notre %2$s.

trans-unit.source: These cookies are needed for a smooth operation of our website.
trans-unit.target: Ces cookies sont nécessaires au bon fonctionnement de notre site web.

trans-unit.source: Saves your consent to using cookies.
trans-unit.target: Enregistre votre consentement à l'utilisation des cookies.

trans-unit.source: Exclusion from counting (as a list of Account IDs)
trans-unit.target: Exclure du comptage (par exemple une liste de Compte IDs)

trans-unit.source: Set by Optimizer webservice. Contains the same Visitor ID as BT_pdc.
trans-unit.target: Défini par le service Web Optimisateur. Contient le même ID de visiteur que BT_pdc.

trans-unit.source: Opt-In cookie that stores the visitor's decision when the tracking opt-in is displayed on the customer's side. Is also used for a possible opt-out.
trans-unit.target: Cookie opt-in qui stocke la décision du visiteur lorsque l'opt-in de suivi est affiché du côté du client. Il est aussi utilisé pour un éventuel opt-out.

trans-unit.source: Opt-In cookie used by "signalize". If the customer chooses "no", the cookie is set with the value "no" and a duration of 50 x 365 days. If the customer chooses "x" or presses the ESC key (no decision), the cookie is set with the value "no" for the validity of 1 day. A value of "yes" is not required, since this is implicitly given by the consent to the actual browser push.
trans-unit.target: Cookie opt-in utilisé par "signalize". Si le client choisit "non", le cookie est réglé avec la valeur "non" et une durée de 50 x 365 jours. Si le client choisit "x" ou appuie sur la touche ESC (aucune décision), le cookie est défini avec la valeur "non" pour la validité d'un jour. Une valeur "oui" n'est pas requise, car elle est implicitement donnée par le consentement à la poussée réelle du navigateur.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter "data-block-cookies" is used, this cookie is called by the API Call _etracker.enableCookies() to indicate that etracker is allowed to set cookies.
trans-unit.target: Si le paramètre "data-block-cookies" est utilisé, ce cookie est appelé par l'API Call _etracker.enableCookies() pour indiquer que etracker est autorisé à définir des cookies.

trans-unit.source: Detection whether the scrolling depth is measured for the visitor.
trans-unit.target: Détecte si la profondeur de défilement est mesurée pour le visiteur.

trans-unit.source: Is only used to detect whether cookies are activated in the visitor's browser or not.
trans-unit.target: Est uniquement utilisé pour détecter si les cookies sont activés dans le navigateur du visiteur ou pas.

trans-unit.source: Contains base64 encoded data of the current visitor session (referrer, number of pages, number of seconds since session started) used for personalization purposes.
trans-unit.target: Contains base64 encoded data of the current visitor session (referrer, number of pages, number of seconds since session started) used for personalization purposes.

trans-unit.source: Contains base64-coded visitor history data (is customer, newsletter recipient etc.) for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Contains base64-coded visitor history data (is customer, newsletter recipient etc.) for personalization.

trans-unit.source: Contains a list of project IDs for which the visitor is excluded. This cookie is set by the web service if the client has configured that not all visitors are assigned to a test, but only to a certain fraction.
trans-unit.target: Contains a list of project IDs for which the visitor is excluded. This cookie is set by the web service if the client has configured that not all visitors are assigned to a test, but only to a certain fraction.

trans-unit.source: Contains a list of project IDs for which the visitor is excluded. This cookie is set by the web service if the client has configured that not all visitors are assigned to a test, but only to a certain fraction.
trans-unit.target: Contains a list of project IDs for which the visitor is excluded. This cookie is set by the web service if the client has configured that not all visitors are assigned to a test, but only to a certain fraction.

trans-unit.source: Data collected in the current session for the optimiser
trans-unit.target: Data collected in the current session for the optimiser

trans-unit.source: OptIn-cookie for Signalize, see corresponding cookie.
trans-unit.target: OptIn-cookie for Signalize, see corresponding cookie.

trans-unit.source: Assigns your browser to a session on the server.
trans-unit.target: Assigns your browser to a session on the server.

trans-unit.source: With the help of these cookies we strive to improve our offer for our users. By means of anonymized data of website users we can optimize the user flow. This enables us to improve ads and website content.
trans-unit.target: With the help of these cookies we strive to improve our offer for our users. By means of anonymized data of website users we can optimize the user flow. This enables us to improve ads and website content.

trans-unit.source: Used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.
trans-unit.target: Used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.

trans-unit.source: Used to store the attribution information, the referrer initially used to visit the website.
trans-unit.target: Used to store the attribution information, the referrer initially used to visit the website.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Contains a token that can be used to retrieve a Client ID from AMP Client ID service. Other possible values indicate opt-out, inflight request or an error retrieving a Client ID from AMP Client ID service.
trans-unit.target: Contains a token that can be used to retrieve a Client ID from AMP Client ID service. Other possible values indicate opt-out, inflight request or an error retrieving a Client ID from AMP Client ID service.

trans-unit.source: Used by DoubleClick (Google Tag Manager) to help identify the visitors by either age, gender or interests.
trans-unit.target: Used by DoubleClick (Google Tag Manager) to help identify the visitors by either age, gender or interests.

trans-unit.source: Contains campaign related information for the user. If you have linked your Google Analytics and Google Ads accounts, Google Ads website conversion tags will read this cookie unless you opt-out.
trans-unit.target: Contains campaign related information for the user. If you have linked your Google Analytics and Google Ads accounts, Google Ads website conversion tags will read this cookie unless you opt-out.

trans-unit.source: Used by Google AdSense to experiment with advertisement efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Used by Google AdSense to experiment with advertisement efficiency.

trans-unit.source: Used as unique user identifier. The cookie allows user tracking across many Microsoft domains.
trans-unit.target: Used as unique user identifier. The cookie allows user tracking across many Microsoft domains.

trans-unit.source: Saves anonymous user data from multiple website visits on multiple sites to test advertisement efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Saves anonymous user data from multiple website visits on multiple sites to test advertisement efficiency.

trans-unit.source: You already opted out of user tracking via your browser's Do-not-track function. We accept that. You can affect this via your browser's settings.
trans-unit.target: You already opted out of user tracking via your browser's Do-not-track function. We accept that. You can affect this via your browser's settings.
